EmailTemplate.name: TIDS_VB_Approved_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your TIDS Virtual Branch Application is Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your TIDS Application is Approved
Congratulations!
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Your application for a Virtual Branch under the IATA TIDS Program has been approved.
The following IATA TIDS Numeric Code has been assigned to you: {!Account.IATACode__c}
This unique industry identifier can now be shared with your travel industry suppliers and partners.
Kindly take a moment to review your office details to ensure they are correct:
Legal Name: {!Account.Name}
Trading Name: {!Account.TradeName__c}
Business Email: {!Account.Email__c}
Website: {!Account.Website}
Phone Number: {!Account.Phone}
Your agency details will be included in the IATA Agency List which industry suppliers reply upon. If any of these details are incorrect, please let us know at the earliest.
Going forward, please also remember to report any changes to your agency’s information or contact details directly through the TIDS Service via the IATA Customer Portal
Thank you for choosing TIDS, IATA's program for standard identification of non-accredited travel sellers.
The IATA TIDS Team
